Summary: odd seamless and soundless moving yellowish hazy but very solid round craft moving straight across the sky
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around June 29th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas at a local out door concert in the city with buildings around so I only have a limited view of the sky but when I looked up I noticed an object just cruising across the sky it looked far away and very close at the same time the color stayed constant at a yellowish orange very solid at the center and hazy around the edges the movement of the object didn't look to be out of the ordinary for a plane as far as speed and stayed in a relatively straight heading but that's where the similarity's ended its hard to describe what was up there because there was a emotional factor involved and it didn't look to be fully in our realm like a solid transparent object it was very strange and invigorating
